channel.title: ggplot2 on Even - A super concise theme for Hugo
channel.description: Recent content in ggplot2 on Even - A super concise theme for Hugo

item.title: Landscape Metrics
item.description: This page was created to provide an additional option to quantify landscape configuration using R. The landscape subject to analysis is powerful and can represent any spatial phenomenon. R will quantify, sample, show, and the areal extent and spatial configuration of patches within a landscape. We will cover a few important steps for data analysis and visualization. Firstly, an introduction to how to use the package, the functions it has, and how to extract the information.
